property.name: include
property.value: Map:Common Data

property.name: description
property.value: This elevator is where [[Clover]] enters from [[UG Apartments]].

properties.property:
[[Clover]] meets ASGORE here on the [[Flawed Pacifist]] and [[Genocide Route]]s.
On the Flawed Pasifist Route, he sends [[Martlet]] away and leads Clover to the Barrier. On the Genocide Route, he attempts to attack Clover. It has no effect and Clover evaporates him, burning the flowers below him. They take his SOUL, free the five human SOULs, and exit the Underground.

property.name: page
property.value: Asgore Dreemurr

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] will not walk past this point.

property.name: description
property.value: If [[Ceroba]] is spared, the game ends here when [[Clover]] gives up their SOUL. The tree above them resembles the one at [[Ketsukane Estate|Chujin's grave]].

property.name: page
property.value: Pacifist Route

property.name: description
property.value: The [[ut:Eight Humans|human children's]] graves seen in ''[[ut:Undertale|Undertale]]''. There is no coffin with a yellow heart.

property.name: description
property.value: This well-dressed monster insists their husband do the dishes when they get home.

property.name: page
property.value: Umbrella Lady

property.name: description
property.value: This monster talks to the [[Umbrella Lady]] about not liking their partner's soap.

property.name: description
property.value: A shadowy figure watches the street below.

properties.property: "Oh no! I'm closed! Come back bright and early for a scoop of Nice Cream!"

property.name: description
property.value: "Throne Room"

property.name: description
property.value: SAVE point "New Home".

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] can pick up Popato Chisps from underneath this bench, even on a [[Genocide Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Popato Chisps

property.name: description
property.value: [[Clover]] can pick up an Adult Soda from this trash can on a [[Pacifist Route]].

property.name: page
property.value: Adult Soda

property.name: description
property.value: On a [[Pacifist Route]], [[Clover]] and [[Martlet]] arrive to confront [[Ceroba]], who is arguing with [[Starlo]] here.

property.name: page
property.value: Ceroba Ketsukane/In Battle

property.name: description
property.value: After Asgore leads [[Clover]] to the Barrier, he shows them the five human SOULS. The two fight; Clover cannot take a turn in the battle and Asgore eventually collects their SOUL.

property.name: page
property.value: Asgore Dreemurr
